class.name: MediaPipeGPUHelper
class.brief_description: Helper class for performing GPU-related operations.
class.description: This is a helper class for performing GPU-related operations with given [MediaPipeGPUResources].

method.name: initialize
method.description: Initializes the helper with given [param gpu_resources]. Returns [code]true[/code] on successful initialization.

method.name: is_initialized
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the helper has been previously initialized.

method.name: make_gpu_buffer_packet
method.description: Gets a [MediaPipePacket] which contain the image as [code]mediapipe::GpuBuffer[/code].

method.name: make_gpu_image
method.description: Gets a [MediaPipeImage] that uses GPU image data from [param image]. Returns [param image] as-is if it is already a GPU image.
